body_html: I think that is probably the cause - appending uses AppendNumeric in proto_text_util.h, which calls StrCat() on the value. This ends up calling FloatToBuffer, which looks like it uses locale-specific snprintf for printing.
body_text: I think that is probably the cause - appending uses AppendNumeric in proto_text_util.h, which calls StrCat() on the value.  This ends up calling FloatToBuffer, which looks like it uses locale-specific snprintf for printing.
body: I think that is probably the cause - appending uses AppendNumeric in proto_text_util.h, which calls StrCat() on the value.  This ends up calling FloatToBuffer, which looks like it uses locale-specific snprintf for printing.
